recipes.title: Arlong's Kiribachi Sword
lines: §lKiribachi§r is a gigantic sword wielded by Arlong.

recipes.title: Smoker's Jitte Sword
lines: The §lNanashaku Jitte§r is Smoker's primary weapon. It is a jitte whose tip is made of Seastone, which Smoker uses to suppress Devil Fruit users' powers in order to debilitate and capture them.
